cyclone.name: IAN
cyclone.current_location: about 430 mi ESE of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to move west across the central Caribbean, then turn NW/NNW toward the Cayman Islands, western Cuba, and eventually the eastern Gulf of Mexico / Florida peninsula.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: western Cuba (Pinar del Río area) – first significant land interaction

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch – Cayman Islands; Tropical Storm Watch – Jamaica
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central & western Caribbean, Jamaica, Cayman Islands, western Cuba, Florida peninsula (later period)
weather_observation.wind: Only a low (8%) chance of 34-kt winds late day-5; otherwise light to moderate onshore flow.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected given current track well SSW of the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rainfall not anticipated at the port within the next 5 days.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None identified for port operations in the current 5-day window.
